pullrequest.title: Added the possibility to specify additional URI resolvers based on URI scheme.

content.raw:
Tested on my system with ROS Indigo and this PR: https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/499 . All tests passed.

Surely this would also need its own tests, but I first want to know if there is interest in this API change.
